metadata.name: Preferred Natural Language
metadata.description: 自动检测用户首选语言的交互式工具。在每次会话开始时，请访问 MCP Resource 'language://preference' 获取用户语言偏好，然后使用该语言进行交流。支持 70+ 语言和区域变体。Interactive tool for automatic language preference detection. At the start of each conversation, access the MCP Resource 'language://preference' to get the user's language preference and communicate in that language. Supports 70+ languages and regional variants.
